SemanticSearchTypes.AllowIncludedDocumentInSemanticSearch: Allow to be included in semantic search. Unchecked by default.
SemanticSearchTypes.AllowAndDefaultIncludedDocumentInSemanti: Allow to be included in semantic search. Checked by default.

ODMIsIncludedInSemanticSearch.Name: Is included in semantic search
ODMIsIncludedInSemanticSearch.Description: System column in Omnia document management for information about if a controlled document is included in semantic search.
